root.name: Plushed
root.description: You play as a white bunny who is controlled by either tilt or touch - tapping anywhere on screen is jump. There are additional characters, such as small creatures who are fed pizza and used to jump higher - clearly paying homage to Critter Crunch. A charming unique art style and fairytale genre is explored, with a few humorous easter eggs to be found. Several boss fights are littered through the game and require careful thinking utilizing skills you've gained to that point.
